sentences.en: Another marriage that nobody counted — a case of bigamy at sea with a has-been Mexican actor — lasted only a day and was annulled.
sentences.cn: 此外还有一桩没有人当真的婚姻――她曾在海上与一个前墨西哥演员犯下重婚罪――这场婚姻只持续了一天就被宣告无效。

sentences.en: Bigamy includes two situation, one is legal bigamy and the other is bigamy.
sentences.cn: 重婚在客观表现上有两种情况, 一种是法律上的重婚,另一种是事实上的重婚.

sentences.en: Bigamy is still outlawed today, at least on paper.
sentences.cn: 然而在今天, 重婚却仅仅是在纸面上违法.

sentences.en: Bigamy, including legal and de facto bigamy bigamy both cases.
sentences.cn: 重婚包括法律上的重婚和事实上的重婚两种情况.

sentences.en: But because a court in Liverpool also found him guilty of bigamy and fraud, with all the charges bundled together, his case provides an iffy precedent, if one at all.
sentences.cn: 该男子目前已被定罪，却是因为利物浦一法院还判定他犯有重婚和诈骗等罪行。 这一数罪并罚的案件提供了一个模棱两可的先例，如果也算是一个先例的话。

sentences.en: De facto marriage has important status in the constitution of the crime of bigamy.
sentences.cn: 事实婚姻在重婚罪的犯罪构成中具有重要的地位.

sentences.en: Do you know the punishment for bigamy? Two mother - in - laws .
sentences.cn: 知道重婚后最大的惩罚是什么 吗 ?两个 丈母娘.

sentences.en: Do you know the punishment for bigamy? Two mothers - in - law !
sentences.cn: [重婚罪]的惩罚为何? 便是拥有两个 丈母娘!

sentences.en: During her life Elizabeth Barrett Browning conjectured that Browning would indulge in some "feeble bigamy" after her death.
sentences.cn: 伊丽莎白·巴雷特·勃朗宁在生时推测丈夫在她死后会陷入“虚弱的重婚罪”里。

sentences.en: He was sentenced to one year's imprisonment for committing bigamy.
sentences.cn: 他因为犯重婚罪被判入狱一年.

sentences.en: It developed that he had another wife living and his indictment for bigamy followed.
sentences.cn: 以后发现他又娶了一房妻室,接着是他被指控犯了重婚罪.

sentences.en: It would be a rare case involving a foreigner if Frank is convicted of bigamy.
sentences.cn: 如果弗兰克被判重婚罪，此案将因外国人介入成为罕见案例。

sentences.en: Judge Bryson: You mean your own mother charged you with bigamy?
sentences.cn: 布莱森: 你的意思是你自己的母亲指控你犯有重婚罪?

sentences.en: The judge talked the prisoner those the jury had acquitted him on the charge of bigamy.
sentences.cn: 法官告诉犯人陪审团撤消对他重婚罪的指控.

sentences.en: The maximum punishment for bigamy is said to be two mothers - in - law .
sentences.cn: 据说重婚者受到的最大惩罚是——两个 丈母娘.

sentences.en: They oppose strongly against bigamy. However, they hold a tolerant attitude towards a third party.
sentences.cn: 对重婚坚决反对, 但对第三者持宽容态度.

trans.tran_en: the crime of being married to two people at the same time
